articles.author: Brooke Steinberg
articles.title: Postpartum depression pill shows positive results, could be approved in a week - New York Post
articles.description: A new study published in the American Journal of Psychiatry showed the pill led to positive effects on depression systems and was “generally well tolerated.”
articles.content:
A first-of-its-kind pill for postpartum depression had promising results in recent trials, and could be approved as soon as next week.
A new study published in the American Journal of Psychiatry sho… [+4063 chars]
